[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@ugdu/packer](./packer.md) &gt; [PkgNode](./packer.pkgnode.md) &gt; [path](./packer.pkgnode.path.md)

## PkgNode.path property

The `path` of the folder for this package. Check [UserConfig.cwd](./packer.userconfig.cwd.md) for what `path` is.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
path: string;
```

## Remarks

For `local package`<!-- -->s, the folder is the package's folder. For `vendor package`<!-- -->s, the folder has a subfolder named 'node\_modules' which contains the package's folder.
